summary: The diff is not publish-only: it modifies backend code and project metadata, and adds promotion/smoke-test documentation templates. REQ-23’s “no code/content changes” constraint is violated by the backend/main.mo modification, and REQ-24’s smoke test is not shown as completed (results file is a blank template).

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the user-approved preview deployment (Version 25) to the live/production site with no code or content changes (promote the exact approved Version 25 build/commit).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes code/project changes, which contradicts the requirement to promote with no additional changes introduced. There is no evidence in the diff of an actual deployment/promotion action; instead there are repository changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a production smoke test using frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md on at least 2 browsers and 2 device types, and document pass/fail (or failures with repro notes).
missing_requirements.reason: A results file was added but it is not filled in (placeholders like "[To be completed]" and unchecked items), so there is no evidence the smoke test was actually executed and recorded.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded backend authorization/access-control behavior including owner initialization and restrictions on who can add media / access profiles.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains this to publish-only with no new features or backend changes; these backend functional changes are not requested by REQ-23/REQ-24.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a dedicated production promotion record document (Production Promotion - Version 25).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 requests promotion with no changes; while documentation may be helpful, this specific new document is not requested as a requirement and constitutes an added artifact/change.
